skillTree.name: Horn of the Wild Hunt
skillTree.description: When this ancient and revered relic is blown, all Elven forces are driven to the Hunt with a savage determination.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +25%

skillTree.name: Cloak of Isha
skillTree.description: This cloak, renewed annually by Ariel herself, is all Orion needs to protect himself.

ui_effects.description: âž• Restores 8 Hit Points per second
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Spear of Kurnous
skillTree.description: When Orion hurls this living weapon with fierce purpose it fells the most powerful foes before returning to its master.

ui_effects.description: âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 400 damage and no explosion damage
âž– Can cause damage to friendly combatants

effects.description: Enable contact effect: "Toxic Venom" that deals heavy damage over time

skillTree.name: Rain of Spines
skillTree.description: A ranger should give no reprieve to the foe. Arrows must fall like a deluge, as deadly as lightning.

skillTree.name: Speed of the Hunter
skillTree.description: Elven hunters emulate Kurnous, the God of the Hunt. Their speed and swiftness is therefore without peer.

skillTree.name: Howl of the Forest
skillTree.description: The Lord charges their troops to fight for Athel Loren, for their very souls are tethered to its fate.

skillTree.name: Sight Beyond Sight
skillTree.description: Waystalkersâ€™ keen eyes can spot an enemy at a distance that defies belief, and so they demand the same of their troops.

skillTree.name: Possessed by the Trickster God
skillTree.description: Once consumed by Loecâ€™s aspect, one can instinctively evade attack through trickery, mimicking his deception of the Dark Gods.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Possessed by the Trickster God"

skillTree.name: Protector
skillTree.description: Asrai are not numerous so they need to care for each other more than any other children of Asuryan.

effects.description: Armour: +8 for Lords and embedded Heroes

skillTree.name: No Walls
skillTree.description: Asrai are masters of field battles and don't wait for the enemy that is behind the walls.

effects.description: Siege towers: +1 per siege item constructed
Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege

skillTree.name: The Chosen One Remains
skillTree.description: Some supreme purpose guides this Chosen One to forsake his sacred duty to the Midwinter Pyre. Whether it is dark or noble remains to be seen.

effects.description: Orion regain his full strength during winter

skillTree.name: Asuryan's Command
skillTree.description: The Creator blesses the Master of the Hunt, ensuring his shots always fly far and true.

skillTree.name: Bounty of Kurnous
skillTree.description: Orion is never left wanting when he reaches for his quiver.

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +2 for "Hawk's Talon"

skillTree.name: The Hunters Gather
skillTree.description: All Asrai heed Orionâ€™s horn â€“ even before it is sounded, it exists as a portent that the Wild Hunt is imminent.

effects.description: Construction cost: -10% for Military Recruitment buildings
Construction time: -33% for Military Recruitment buildings

skillTree.name: Eyes of the Forest
skillTree.description: Those unfortunate enough to find themselves in the hunterâ€™s sights will not escape their attentions, for it is already too late.

skillTree.name: Part the Boughs
skillTree.description: Foliage and shrubbery oft suffice to hide from the mundane, but the King in the Woods is anything but.

effects.description: This character becomes able to see enemies hiding in forest regardless of distance

skillTree.name: Neverending Hunt
skillTree.description: "The rites of the summer gave you your purpose. Our songs filled you with the blood of Kurnous. He lives, through you. He hunts, through you... "

effects.description: Cooldown: -50% to "Hawk's Talon", "Prey of Anath Raema" and "Hounds of Orion"

skillTree.name: Call of the Hunt
skillTree.description: The enemies of Athel Loren are nothing more than swine meant to be swept away.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen

skillTree.name: Woodland Renewal
skillTree.description: As springtime approaches all life in Athel Loren is invigorated.

skillTree.name: Speed of the Hunt
skillTree.description: The Wild Hunt is instinctual. All who are called by it, practically glide through the forest to answer.

skillTree.name: Arielâ€™s Blessing
skillTree.description: The Lady Ariel imbues her husband with powerful wards and courage enhancing auras.

skillTree.name: Avatar
skillTree.description: Thousands souls in one being.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +25% for all Elf units and characters

skillTree.name: Hawk's Talon
skillTree.description: Nature manifests at Orion's call, raining a flurry of arrows upon the enemy in defence of Athel Loren.

ui_effects.description: âž• Calls down 25 projectiles each dealing 0 50 damage and no explosion damage
âž• Strong vs a single unit
âž– Weak vs a single combatant

skillTree.name: Fleetfinger
skillTree.description: Nook and fire. Nook again, and fire. Nook a third time, and fire. All in a heartbeat.

skillTree.name: Piercing Shots
skillTree.description: The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.

skillTree.name: Bottomless Quiver
skillTree.description: Always willing to fight on, a widened quiver allows arrows to rain, almost without end.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Prey of Anath Raema
skillTree.description: By all means summon the bloodthirsty Goddess of the Hunt to assist you, but always make sure you thank her afterwardsâ€¦

skillTree.name: Hounds of Orion
skillTree.description: Orion's wolves run with their Lord, defending his person with great savagery and scant regard for their own lives.

ui_effects.description: âž• Does not affect friendly troops
âž• Medium, randomly-moving area of effect
âž– Weak vs a single combatant

skillTree.name: Endurance of the Oak
skillTree.description: Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.

skillTree.name: Impenetrable Bark
skillTree.description: Using the forest itself as a shield, this Lord is protected by their devotion to Athel Loren.

skillTree.name: Tempered Rigour
skillTree.description: When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.

skillTree.name: Violent Delights
skillTree.description: There is no greater thrill than to be in the midst of battle, slaughtering in the forest's name.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Blessing of Morai-Heg
skillTree.description: Morai-heg (also known as the Crow-Goddess or the Crone) is the Elven Goddess of Fate and Death.

skillTree.name: Blessing of Hekarti
skillTree.description: Hekarti, the Hydra Queen, is the Elven Goddess of Conjurations and Dark Magic.

skillTree.name: Blessing of Isha
skillTree.description: Isha is the Goddess of Fertility, Nature, Harvest, Bountiful Land, protector of the natural order and mother of the Elven race.

skillTree.name: Blessing of Addaioth
skillTree.description: Addaioth is the God of the All-Consuming Flame and The Bringer of Wrath.

skillTree.name: Blessing of Kurnous
skillTree.description: Kurnous is the God of the Hunt, and the lord of wild places.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Piercing Thorns
skillTree.description: Every blade and barbed branch will eventually find its mark â€“ when they do, the forestâ€™s infinite anger is truly felt.

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Eternal Guard, Eternal Wardens and Dryads units
Melee attack: +4 for Eternal Guard, Eternal Wardens and Dryads units
Weapon strength: +5% for Eternal Guard, Eternal Wardens and Dryads units
Melee attack: +6 for Eternal Guard, Eternal Wardens and Dryads units
Weapon strength: +10% for Eternal Guard, Eternal Wardens and Dryads units

skillTree.name: Bolts of the Forest
skillTree.description: Let each bolt be imbued with the strength of Kurnous, and bring death to all his enemies.

effects.description: Missile strength: +3% for Glade Guard, Deepwood Scouts, and Waywatchers units
Reload time reduction: +5% for Glade Guard, Deepwood Scouts, and Waywatchers units
Missile strength: +5% for Glade Guard, Deepwood Scouts, and Waywatchers units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Glade Guard, Deepwood Scouts, and Waywatchers units
Missile strength: +10% for Glade Guard, Deepwood Scouts, and Waywatchers units

skillTree.name: Striking Branches
skillTree.description: Let the enemy feel the fury of nature, embodied in these warriors as they crash through their lines.

effects.description: Speed: +5% for Glade Riders, Wild Riders, Great Stag Knights, Zoats and Sisters of the Thorn units
Speed: +10% for Glade Riders, Wild Riders, Great Stag Knights, Zoats and Sisters of the Thorn units
Charge bonus: +10 for Glade Riders, Wild Riders, Great Stag Knights, Zoats and Sisters of the Thorn units
Speed: +15% for Glade Riders, Wild Riders, Great Stag Knights, Zoats and Sisters of the Thorn units
Charge bonus: +20 for Glade Riders, Wild Riders, Great Stag Knights, Zoats and Sisters of the Thorn units

skillTree.name: Swinging Boughs
skillTree.description: The warrior strikes with the strength of a swinging tree limb; few can stand against such strength.

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Wardancers, Bladesingers and Wildwood Wardens, Wildwood Rangers units
Melee attack: +4 for Wardancers, Bladesingers and Wildwood Wardens, Wildwood Rangers units
Melee defence: +4 for Wardancers, Bladesingers and Wildwood Wardens, Wildwood Rangers units
Vigour loss reduction: -10% for Wardancers and Wildwood Ranger units
Melee attack: +6 for Wardancers, Bladesingers and Wildwood Wardens, Wildwood Rangers units
Melee defence: +6 for Wardancers, Bladesingers and Wildwood Wardens, Wildwood Rangers units

skillTree.name: Ancient Bark
skillTree.description: Centuries upon centuries of existence have given these ancient Tree Spirits a natural armour, mitigating any physical blows dealt against them.

effects.description: Armour: +6 for Tree Kin, Grove Guardians and Treeman units
Physical resistance: 5% for Tree Kin, Grove Guardians and Treeman units
Armour: +9 for Tree Kin, Grove Guardians and Treeman units
Physical resistance: 10% for Tree Kin, Grove Guardians and Treeman units
Armour: +12 for Tree Kin, Grove Guardians and Treeman units

skillTree.name: Wings of the Forest
skillTree.description: Not all of the forest's guardians are rooted to the ground â€“ flying enemies will always be in danger from the woodland's airborne protectors.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +3% for Hawk Riders, Great Eagle, and Forest Dragon units
Weapon strength: +5% for Hawk Riders, Great Eagle, and Forest Dragon units
Charge bonus: +10 for Hawk Riders, Great Eagle, and Forest Dragon units
Reload time reduction: +5% for Hawk Riders units
Weapon strength: +10% for Hawk Riders, Great Eagle, and Forest Dragon units
Charge bonus: +20 for Hawk Riders, Great Eagle, and Forest Dragon units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Hawk Riders units

skillTree.name: Shield of the Forest
skillTree.description: Armour as hard as the ancient bark of the forest, it repels blows that would rend others asunder.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 10% for Eternal Guard, Eternal Wardens, Dryads, Wardancers, Bladesingers and Wildwood Wardens, Wildwood Rangers units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +12 for Eternal Guard, Eternal Wardens, Dryads, Wardancers, Bladesingers and Wildwood Wardens, Wildwood Rangers units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Eternal Guard, Eternal Wardens, Dryads, Wardancers, Bladesingers and Wildwood Wardens, Wildwood Rangers units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Nature's Quiver
skillTree.description: What is a ranger without an arrow? Who can be the best without dozens?

effects.description: Missile resistance: 15% for Glade Guard, Deepwood Scouts, and Waywatchers units (Rank 7 and above)
Ammunition: +20% for Glade Guard, Deepwood Scouts, and Waywatchers units (Rank 7 and above)
Range: +10% for Glade Guard, Deepwood Scouts, and Waywatchers units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Swift & Sturdy
skillTree.description: Moving like the wind, whistling past tree branches, the riders of the forest hunt any who would do harm to the place they call home.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 Glade Riders, Wild Riders, Great Stag Knights, Zoats, Sisters of the Thorn and Hawk Riders units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +10% Glade Riders, Wild Riders, Great Stag Knights, Zoats, Sisters of the Thorn and Hawk Riders units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +15 for Glade Riders, Wild Riders, Great Stag Knights, Zoats, Sisters of the Thorn and Hawk Riders units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile strength: +10% for Glade Riders, Sisters of the Thorn and Hawk Riders units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: The Forest's Roar
skillTree.description: All of Athel Loren shouts with a fury as old as the ages, and the enemy knows its power.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 15% for Tree Kin, Grove Guardians, Treeman, Great Eagle, and Forest Dragon units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +5 for Tree Kin, Grove Guardians, Treeman, Great Eagle, and Forest Dragon units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Tree Kin, Grove Guardians, Treeman, Great Eagle, and Forest Dragon units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Ever-Reaching Tendrils
skillTree.description: The denizens of the forest will travel many miles to see those who would threaten Athel Loren put to rout.

skillTree.name: Wonders of the Forest
skillTree.description: Athel Loren provides for its deserving children, with wondrous boons gifted in recognition of their many endeavours.

skillTree.name: Nature's Salve
skillTree.description: The Worldroots provide succour for their children, purging the forests of any corrupting infestation.

skillTree.name: Obscuring Canopy
skillTree.description: The magics of the woods obscure and connive, able to turn enemy blades away from their targets.

skillTree.name: Growth of the Forest
skillTree.description: The forest provides for its warriors, rehabilitating and regenerating wounds suffered in its defence.

skillTree.name: Open Branches
skillTree.description: From all corners of the forest, they come to defend their homes.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Swiftfingers
skillTree.description: The dead do not want for material possessions, yet the living may yet find value in themâ€¦

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.name: Perenniality
skillTree.description: Like the forest itself, the warriors of Athel Loren ebb and flow and regenerate with the passing of time.

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Home Amongst the Boughs
skillTree.description: The forest-dwellers draw from the strength of Kurnous to fight ever harder, and be ever stronger.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: King in the Woods
skillTree.description: â€œDo you understand? You are more than you were â€“ more than just flesh and bone; you are everything that defines us."

effects.description: Passive ability: "Guardian" when Ariel is embedded in Lord's army
Charge bonus: +25 for Wild Riders and Great Stag Knights units
Weapon strength: +20% for Wild Riders and Great Stag Knights units
